page.title: 18BUDGENS
page.content: The new Budgens supermarket in Buckingham rivalled the local Tescos, which had to close down because of lack of custom. A consumer survey shows people's thoughts about this: 1.Do you think that having Budgens here in Buckingham is a good thing? {90% thought YES 10% thought NO. 2.How often do you go to Budgens? {30% go twice a week,30% go once a {week 10% go 3-4 times a week,20% go as {little as possible. 3.Where did you buy your food in Buckingham before Budgens opened? {80% said Tescos,20% said anywhere {but Tescos 4.Would you still go to Budgens if Tescos reopened? {40% said YES,60% said NO
